content.prompt: At the time the painting was produced, the style and subject of artworks such as Isto’s Attack were being challenged by a new group of European artists who argued that modern art should

choices.label: return to its Renaissance and Neoclassical roots
move beyond the representational and toward the abstract
place itself in the service of the state’s propaganda needs
use mass-market imagery to comment on consumer society

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
